channel.title: [delta]question
channel.description:
Dear moparscapers,
In my server I want to add a sort of helpcenter. If a player clicks on an object, he gets the option admin or mod. Then it will tele him to a place. Now i want to know how i can make it that it will send a message to an admin if they click on admin and a message to a mod if they click mod? can someone help me plz?
halflive9
